statements: SELECT * FROM customer_payment_history;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM customer_payment_history WHERE payment_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM customer_payment_history WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customer_payment_history WHERE credit_utilization > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM customer_payment_history ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payment_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM customer_payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM customer_payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payment > 1000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT AVG(credit_utilization) AS avg_utilization, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM customer_payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM customer_payment_history ORDER BY payment_method ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM customer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_method FROM customer_payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, balance, utilization_rate FROM credit_utilization WHERE utilization_rate > 50 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND amount <= 500 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS average_payment FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 500
SELECT c.customer_id, c.balance, cu.utilization_rate FROM customer_payments c JOIN credit_utilization cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id WHERE c.amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM CustomerPaymentHistory;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM CustomerPaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date FROM CustomerPaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM CreditUtilization ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_count, last_payment_date FROM PaymentPatterns WHERE payment_count >= 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM CustomerPaymentHistory ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit, credit_used FROM CreditUtilization WHERE credit_used > 500 ORDER BY credit_used ASC, credit_limit DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, customer_id, payment_count, last_payment_date FROM PaymentPatterns WHERE payment_count >= 5 ORDER BY last_payment_date ASC, payment_count DESC;

SELECT p.customer_id, p.payment_date, c.credit_limit, c.credit_used FROM CustomerPaymentHistory p JOIN CreditUtilization c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.credit_used < c.credit_limit ORDER BY c.credit_used ASC, p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT payments.payment_amount, transactions.transaction_type FROM payments JOIN transactions ON payments.payment_id = transactions.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit, current_balance FROM customers JOIN credit_utilization ON customers.customer_id = credit_utilization.customer_id WHERE current_balance > credit_limit * 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit FROM Customer WHERE credit_limit > 500;
SELECT * FROM Payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM Customer JOIN Payment ON Customer.customer_id = Payment.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payment WHERE payment_amount >= 1000 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(credit_limit) AS avg_credit_limit FROM Customer;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Payment.payment_amount, Payment.payment_date FROM Customer JOIN Payment ON Customer.customer_id = Payment.customer_id WHERE Payment.payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY Payment.payment_date ASC;

SELECT Customer.customer_id, Payment.payment_amount, Payment.payment_date, PaymentHistory.payment_type FROM Customer JOIN Payment ON Customer.customer_id = Payment.customer_id LEFT JOIN PaymentHistory ON Payment.payment_id = PaymentHistory.history_id WHERE Payment.payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY Payment.payment_date DESC;
